LOGIN.REQUIRED: You need to be logged in to continue
LOGIN.EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please log in again

LOGOUT.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to log out?
LOGOUT.FORCED: You have been logged out due to inactivity

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: The journey ends here...
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: You tried to open a locked door without the key... and failed!

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Trap Triggered
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: You fell into a trap! The path you tried to follow simply... doesn't exist.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Incomplete Map
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The quest was accepted, but the map is blank... This route has not been charted by any cartographer of the realm.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Arcane Fog
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: A magical fog blocks your vision. It seems this page was lost between planes.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Corrupted Scroll
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The scroll crumbles in your hands. Nothing remains of this content but dust and echoes.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Silent Oracle
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: You consult the oracle... and get no answer. This page responds to no god.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Inaccessible Portal
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The portal did not open. Maybe this URL requires a legendary artifact to work.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Lost Tavern
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The tavern you seek was burned down by goblins. Sadly, only ashes remain.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Illusion Spell
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: You encountered an illusion. This page looked real... but was just an empty spell.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Code Guardian
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The code guardian blocks your entry. Only real pages may pass. This one is not.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Wrong Path
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: You turned left when you should have entered the dungeon. Recalculate your journey, adventurer.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Invalid Symbol
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The symbol was drawn incorrectly in the summoning circle. This page could not be brought from another plane.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Empty Grimoire
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: You flip through the Grimoire... but the pages are blank. The knowledge you seek has been sealed by arcane forces.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Threshold Guardian
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The Guardian of the Threshold stares at you in silence. Access denied. Turn back before it grows angry.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Abyssal Silence
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: You heard a whisper... and then absolute silence. This page was devoured by the Shadows.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Failed Convergence
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The Convergence did not happen. Without the proper alignment, this information cannot be revealed.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Impenetrable Veil
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The silver blade failed to cut through the darkness. This page is shielded by a veil even the Hunter cannot pierce.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Erased Name
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: You tried to access the Registry... but the name was crossed out. This page was forgotten by even the oldest gods.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Absent Reflection
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The black mirror showed nothing. This content has been banished beyond the Abyss.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Cabala Denies
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The Cabal did not grant you access. You must gain more occult knowledge to proceed.

NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Digital Ruins
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The entity that once inhabited this page left long ago. Now only echoes and digital ruins remain.
